document_data.name: Kelter Minstrelwish
document_data.refs3e: {{Cite dragon/299/Elminster's Guide to the Realms: Moon Mountain Brewery|81}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Kelter Minstrelwish''' was an apprentice brewmaster at the [[Moon Mountain Brewery]] on the [[Unicorn Run]] in [[northwest Faerûn]], ''circa'' the [[1372 DR|Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR]].
document_data.Personality: As a young [[halfling]], Kelter was more curious and daring than most of the inhabitants of the brewery.{{Cite dragon/299/Elminster's Guide to the Realms: Moon Mountain Brewery|80}}
document_data.Abilities: Kelter was learning about all aspects of the business of running a brewery, being an apprentice of the two most senior members of the staff, [[Nurvala Minstrelwish]] and [[Yarimmur Borulglar]]. He was also quite good at spying and eavesdropping.
document_data.Relationships: Nurvala and Yarimmur took Kelter under their wing when they found out that he had been spying on them and discovered their smuggling operation. The three halflings were the only ones at the brewery who knew that the [[human]] merchant named [[Tarth Brallowgath]] was also their contact in the [[Black Network]]. They smuggled coded messages and small, valuable objects inside barrels of [[ale]], rum, and hard [[cider]] to recipients designated by Brallowgath.
